poem:
"Uncharted Shores"

Brexit plans in knots and fray,
Echoes of discord at customs bay.
Commerce stale in metaphorical posts
Where imports morph to ethereal ghosts.
Yet in this disarray, a melody known,
A nation's heartbeat, steady in tone.
Bound by sterling and flag unfurled,
A quaint island reshaping the world.
